page.title: 01EXTRACT 520/65 0466
page.content:
MAJOR LAND USES 11,05,14 AMENITIES 26,37,46
{CLUBS}Youth club meets in renovated farm house (Bloom House) {COMMUNICATIONS}Roads recently improved and developed to make town centre more accessible. {EMPLOYMENT}A large percentage of the inhabitants work for the Livingston Development Corporation. {FARMING}Mainly grass. Old field boundaries still exist. {HOUSING}Recently, plots of land have become available for sale for private building. {INDUSTRY}Computer factory has recently been completed. {LANDSCAPE}The area around factories and river is highly landscaped with picnic tables and small trees.
